description:
Jade has found out that Alina is the Executioner and hounds her to join Silver Sword. Then a certain adventurer with a grudge sets a raid boss loose...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I May Be the Executioner, but I`ll Be Fired If People Find Out, So I`ll Have to Use Force
Shokeinin Desu ga, Shoutai ga Bareru to Kubi nano de Jitsuryokukoushi Shiyou to Omoimasu
Én vagyok a Bevégző, de kirúgnak, ha ez kiderül, szóval erőszakhoz kell folyamodnom
処刑人ですが, 正体がバレるとクビなので実力行使しようと思います
